text: I'll be Seeing You is a drama movie released in 1944. Ginger Rogers is Mary Marshall; Shirley Temple is Barbara Marshall. The movie is about social outcasts, romance and Christmas. The movie was released in January 1945 in United States theaters. It performed extremely well at the box office. Category:1944 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle
title: I'll Be Seeing You
